message: Since 'winner takes all' capitalism was introduced by Ronald Regan there has been an inevitable drift towards oligarchy. The 1% keep getting richer. First generation Entrepreneurial wealth is morphing into dynastic wealth. Soon it will not be possible to distinguish economically between Russian oligarchy and American oligarchy. I delete two oligarchies will have more in common with each other than with 99% of their fellow countrymen.

Jessica Coleman-it was NOT aimed at you, so don't take it so personally & I WAS NOT calling this dad a narcissist, so I was not presuming anything actually. It wasn't directed at one person.
